
                            
                            <div class="xdg"><p>红警我感觉绝对有包，一小时了还没达到领取条件<br>你们自测红警OL攻略<br>1.闪现一下APP搜红警，横幅第一个元旦组队，自己做队长拉2个小号，拿90个加速一小时，组队界面滑倒下面做能量任务，能拿17个加速一小时。<br>2.掌上道聚城APP搜红警，看等级能领10个一小时加速<br>3.如果还不够用金币买加速建城工具，背包里面有个等级宝箱，升一级可以开一次也有加速，抽卡有概率给加速<br><a href="https://game.weixin.qq.com/cgi-bin/activity/static/game_distribution/index.html?liteapp=liteapp%3A%2F%2Fwxalite16643a0473b2d98c32c8777cd5fa72e6%3Fpath%3Dpages%252Fgame_distribution%252Findex&amp;wechat_pkgid=activity__circle_daily_lottery_index&amp;appid=wxd383fb5d440a7267&amp;aid=619010&amp;bid=game_share&amp;pid=0&amp;kid=wQG51CNpyl0VViDn2Z81-MTFJnpoBZrul5dPEx7tcfE-v2&amp;share_key=WAhdaD8cvdzVUlXCvxBMXWQ7RQyqQn0UvUFOWONu-sE&amp;pm_share_key=WAhdaD8cvdzVUlXCvxBMXWQ7RQyqQn0UvUFOWONu-sE&amp;promoter_target_id=30001&amp;ssid=1&amp;from_id=3&amp;share_id=g210Q8CHQw6GtLlUMRWCCA&amp;origin_share_id=qJQErj8pQUquivgr1xpx7Q">https://game.weixin.qq.com/cgi-bin/activity/static/game_distribution/index.html?liteapp=liteapp%3A%2F%2Fwxalite16643a0473b2d98c32c8777cd5fa72e6%3Fpath%3Dpages%252Fgame_distribution%252Findex&amp;wechat_pkgid=activity__circle_daily_lottery_index&amp;appid=wxd383fb5d440a7267&amp;aid=619010&amp;bid=game_share&amp;pid=0&amp;kid=wQG51CNpyl0VViDn2Z81-MTFJnpoBZrul5dPEx7tcfE-v2&amp;share_key=WAhdaD8cvdzVUlXCvxBMXWQ7RQyqQn0UvUFOWONu-sE&amp;pm_share_key=WAhdaD8cvdzVUlXCvxBMXWQ7RQyqQn0UvUFOWONu-sE&amp;promoter_target_id=30001&amp;ssid=1&amp;from_id=3&amp;share_id=g210Q8CHQw6GtLlUMRWCCA&amp;origin_share_id=qJQErj8pQUquivgr1xpx7Q</a><img src="https://pic.xiaodigu.cn/pic/20250119/1737278463561392_776.jpg"><img src="https://pic.xiaodigu.cn/pic/20250119/1737271996924784_608.png"></p></div>
